Hash desc: This number is the result of a primitive cryptographic hashing function. The hexadecimal format saves space and is easy to read.
Data desc: Type some data in this box. Notice that the hash field below will update for each keystroke. Can you create a nice looking hash?
cryptocurrency desc: The currency (token) issued as a reward in the proof-of-work mining process.
blockchain desc: The public ledger where the network records (transactions) are written.
